LightningComponentBundle.description: Lets you rate and leave feedback for a Knowledge Article.

property.name: hideVoteCounter
property.label: Show Upvote/Downvote Count
property.description: Controls whether upvote and downvote counts are shown

property.name: feedbackFormBehavior
property.label: Feedback Form Behavior
property.datasource: Always Show,Only Show After Upvote/Downvote,Only Show After Downvote,Always Hide
property.description: Controls when the feedback form is shown

property.name: ratingRequired
property.label: Rating Required for Feedback Submission
property.description: Determines whether a user needs to submit a vote before feedback is submitted

property.name: descriptionRequired
property.label: Description Required for Feedback Submission
property.description: Determines whether a user needs to submit a description before feedback is submitted

property.name: displayFileAttachmentSection
property.label: Allow File Attachment
property.description: Controls whether the File Attachment section is shown

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id
property.description: This field needs to remain with the following value: {!recordId}. It is needed to automatically detect record Ids in communities.
